definition_list_item.term: Implementation of the class of ProphetStor DPL storage adapter of Federator.

definition.paragraph: # v2.0.1 Consistency group support # v2.0.2 Pool aware scheduler # v2.0.3 Consistency group modification support # v2.0.4 Port ProphetStor driver to use new driver model # v2.0.5 Move from httplib to requests

desc_content.paragraph: Creates a clone of the specified volume.
Creates a volume from a snapshot.
Any initialization the volume driver does while starting.
If ‘refresh’ is True, run update the stats first.
Spawn a REFERENCED volume from a snapshot.
